## Vector4.axisPX() method

Creates a new Vector4 pointing in the positive direction of the X axis, i.e. vec4(1, 0, 0, 0)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisPX(): Vector4;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md)

The new vector
